scripts.dev: bun run kill-port -- 5173 3000 && bun nx run-many -t serve -p frontend,backend --parallel=2
scripts.start: bun run kill-port -- 5173 3000 && bun nx run-many -t start -p frontend,backend --parallel=2
scripts.dev:frontend: bun run kill-port -- 5173 && bun nx serve frontend
scripts.dev:backend: bun run kill-port -- 3000 && bun nx serve backend
scripts.start:frontend: bun run kill-port -- 5173 && bun nx start frontend
scripts.start:backend: bun run kill-port -- 3000 && bun nx start backend
